code: import*as yup from'yup';var SUPPORTED_FORMATS=['image/jpg','image/jpeg','audio/mp3','image/png'];export var FileSchema=yup.object().shape({file:yup.mixed().nullable().test('fileSize','The file is too large',function(value){return(value===null||value===void 0?void 0:value.size)<5000000;}).test('type','Only the following formats are accepted: Image and Audio',function(value){return value&&SUPPORTED_FORMATS.includes(value.type);})});
